questions.question: Price money, dialog reloads
questions.answer: Someone called me and told that you had won 2 Millions and to claim the price you have to send me 100 rupees 3 dialog reloads.After I asked from my father about that, he asked from one of his friends and that friend told to him that was scam by someone and not to reload. Sometimes I am getting text with a link that I  have a parcel and to receive it I must pay some little amount. That is very popular scam nowadays

questions.question: Daraz and Ikman scams online shopping
questions.answer: Mainly shady sellers on Daraz, Ikman, and texts saying that I've been selected for a job that I have no recollection of applying to.

questions.question: Homeless woman
questions.answer: women pretend lost her wallet, want money to eat

questions.question: Uber
questions.answer: Uber driver asked money of whole trip when i cancelled the trip

questions.question: Bus conductor
questions.answer: One time when im traveling on bus a one guy who  pretended to a bus conductor,collected money from us and quickly disappeared.

questions.question: Fake charity
questions.answer: I have seen a lot of fake charity scams. They come to our house and ask for money for a fake charity.

questions.question: pickme app
questions.answer: Even i hv added my payment details in pickme app I paid money to drivers.It means i didnt know that i hv added payment details ,and they charged from my account.So for 4 months i hv double paid for my pickme rides.Those drivers didnt tell me that i hv added my card no need of cash.When i realized the situation i complained and i didnt got my money back.They didnt even care .

questions.question: Fake lottery
questions.answer: I have seen a lot of fake lottery scams. They come to our house and ask for money for a fake lottery.

questions.question: tuk tuk  three wheel
questions.answer: Once a tuk tuk driver charged more than the price that was displayed in his meter

questions.question: no meter tuk tuk three wheel
questions.answer: I stopped a wheeler on the road and asked for a quick trip and was told much more than the usual amount. After that, when I went by metered taxi, it cost much less than that amount.

questions.question: grocery expired food
questions.answer: A grocery shop once sold me expired food

questions.question: galle face
questions.answer: A normal taxi charges a lot of money to go from the GF to MT. Only later did I know that the amount was too much.

questions.question: old clothes as handmade
questions.answer: When I went to buy a dress from a clothing shop on the street, they charged a lot of money, saying that the clothes were handmade. But later I realised that they were very old clothes.

questions.question: fake gem
questions.answer: I bought a gem from a shop and later found out that it was fake
